SEARCH

Class Credit

java.lang.Object
Account
Credit
public class Credit extends Account
The Credit class represents a credit account. It extends the Account class and includes additional functionality for handling credit limits and payments. This class allows for charges and payments within the credit limit.

      public boolean isDepositWithinLimit(double amount)

      Returns:
      true if the amount is valid

    • determineCreditLimit

      public static double determineCreditLimit(int creditScore)
      Determines the credit limit for a customer based on their credit score. The method categorizes the credit score into ranges, assigning a random credit limit within a specified range for each score bracket.
      Parameters:
      creditScore - The credit score of the customer.
      Returns:
      A credit limit amount based on the customer's creditÂ score. Â
